data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Negeri Sembilan, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Negeri Sembilan, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Negeri Sembilan words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 35,083 believers in Negeri Sembilan against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, please help the 35,083 believers in the state of Negeri Sembilan to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, remember the Mah Meri, Besisi people. Make the Mah Meri, Besisi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Negeri Sembilan, Malaysia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 35,083 believers living in Negeri Sembilan, Malaysia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Negeri Sembilan, Malaysia has a population of 997,100.

We estimate Negeri Sembilan has 35,083 people who might know Jesus, 61,320 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 900,697 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Negeri Sembilan, Malaysia. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
